tool_description: A complete free API that delivers information about the top 100 Cryptocurrencies Prices, Exchanges, and Crypto related news.
name: Crypto Ranking
title: Crypto Ranking

api_list.name: Get Crypto related news
api_list.description: Get the latest news about crypto currency
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-ranking1.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-ranking1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
